Name: Rim Collection
ReputationStatements: I wouldn't turn to you unless I had no other option. Well, I have no other option. Do this, if you care, and maybe we'll talk pay.
We don't like you, you don't like us, but still, I think we can do business. Want to change that?
Hello again, Commander. You need money, we need work done, take a look at this contract.
The Rim Collection is in need of some supplemental mercenaries and we've heard you're competent. Care to take a look?.
We've got a good thing going here, Commander, let's keep the roll going. Take a gander at this contract, I think you'll find it satisfactory.
Commander, the Rim has need of you again. We've got a great contract for you and hope you can take care of it for us. The compensation is good, like always.
We count on you like we count on Able's Aces, Commander, you're one of our own at this point. Do this contract and rewards will flow like always.
MissionSuccessStatements: Great show, Commander! The Rim is very pleased with your efforts. I've remitted payment, you should receive it shortly, and don't forget to come around again sometime.
GoodFaithFailureStatements: You gave it a solid try there, Commander. You didn't get it done, but you did your damndest. Sometimes it doesn't work out. Thanks for the effort at least.
BadFaithFailureStatements: Commander, this effort is embarrassing for both of us. Don't bother contacting us for payment, it's not coming. Do better next time.
Description: The Rim Collection is a minor nationstate founded by six planets that remembered the old Rim Worlds Republic, pre-Amaris, and wanted to recreate that dream. They are small, democratic, and pretty much harmless. Their military is composed of the mercenary group Able's Aces who have become national heroes for the Collection.
